description: Puhas is a farm-to-fork firm that evolved from a social enterprise to solve difficulties in the AgTech area and supply fresh fruit to merchants and customers. Puhas plans to be a B2B2C enterprise with a unique strategy for developing bottom-up and efficient supply chains to directly deliver the freshest vegetables and fruits to retail grocery shops and customers. Puhas is part of a strategic alliance that has created two 'Kisan Pathshalas' (Farmer Schools) outside Ranchi, Jharkhand.
